descriptionHtml:
[color=khaki][size=6]Description[/size][/color]
File contains also .esp and textures, so this mod does not require any additional mods
Piercings are made for  CBBE Bodyslide body (converted [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72324]from my mod for UNPB[/url])
Piercings are craftable in jewellery, 2 types: with chains (tops and bottoms)
3 color variants of each (emerald,  ruby, sapphire)
You can make anything what you want while it is non-commercial destribution and you give me credits as original mod author.
I don't give permission to upload it in steam.
PS. Your screens would be welcome!
PS2. Bodyslide kills sharp meshes, so if you want to have properly shaded gems after you builded meshes in Bodyslide you need to go to folder \data\meshes\newmiller\piercingsrevis and fix normals manually in files piercingChainsnecknipUNPB20sharp(50-16red)_1.nif _0.nif (also blue and grn) and
piercingChainsbeltUNPB20sharp(50-16red)_1.nif _0.nif (also grn blue) and open them with nifscope-> find meshes that contains "gem" and "gemIns" in name. For meshes, that contains "gem" - right mouse click on it - >Mesh-> face normals, for "gemIns" right mouse click on it - >Mesh-> face normals, after that right mouse click on it - >Mesh-> flip normals. And save the nif file for each nif. (Or you can wait while ousnius update Bodyslide and build meshes with it, looks like he is going to fix sharp edges problem in Bodyslide).

PS3. Thanks to ousnius for Outfit Studio help
author: newmiller
